Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: The student can accurately illustrate a plant receiving water and depict it growing well.
The student can properly illustrate a plant not receiving water and demonstrate it not growing well.
The student can effectively illustrate a plant receiving sunlight and show it thriving.
The student can illustrate a plant without sunlight and demonstrate it is not thriving.
The student can observe and include patterns in their drawings, showing a healthy plant with both water and sunlight, and a struggling plant without water or sunlight.
CANNOT: The student might occasionally omit labels on one or two drawings (e.g., forgetting to label water or sunlight).
The student might sometimes show slight inconsistency in plant sizes relative to light and water levels, but the overall concept remains accurate.
